sentences.en: ...the incredible beauty and symmetry of a snowflake.
sentences.cn: …雪花令人难以置信的美丽和对称。

sentences.en: A center of symmetry must coincide with the center of mass.
sentences.cn: 对称中心必须与质量中心重合.

sentences.en: He was not insensible to her rosy symmetry.
sentences.cn: 他不可能对她那艳丽的面孔视若无睹.

sentences.en: I feel the delicate symmetry of a leaf.
sentences.cn: 我感触到一片树叶的完美的对称性.

sentences.en: I loved the house because it had perfect symmetry.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这所房子，因为它非常对称。

sentences.en: If a magnetic field is switched on, the symmetry is broken.
sentences.cn: 如果加上磁场, 就破坏了这种对称性.

sentences.en: Order and symmetry were important elements of beauty.
sentences.cn: 秩序和对称是美的重要因素.

sentences.en: Planetary nebulae are a type of isolated gaseous nebulae possessing a fair degree of bilateral symmetry.
sentences.cn: 行星状星云是一类孤立的气体星云,具有相当程度的双侧对称性.

sentences.en: The " hat " distinguishes symmetry operations from symmetry elements.
sentences.cn: “ 帽号 ” 用来将对称操作与对称元素区别开.

sentences.en: The human body has a symmetry that is basic to our sense of beauty.
sentences.cn: 人体的对称性构成我们审美观的基础.

sentences.en: the perfect symmetry of the garden design
The rule of combination of symmetry operations is successive performance of them.
sentences.cn: 对称操作的组合规则,是逐次地去运用它们.

sentences.en: The same holds true for any molecule with a center of symmetry.
sentences.cn: 对任何有对称中心的分子同样是对的.

sentences.en: The superpowers pledged to maintain symmetry in their arms shipments.
sentences.cn: 超级大国承诺在武器运输方面要保持数量均衡。

sentences.en: The symmetry groups to which real molecules may belong are very numerous.
sentences.cn: 真实分子可能属于的对称群是非常多的.

sentences.en: There was a certain symmetry to coming back to New York, where I started my artistic life all those years ago.
sentences.cn: 人生的经历似乎是对称的，我又回到了纽约，那里是我早年开始艺术生涯的地方。

sentences.en: What they did ask for was that we demand in negotiations the perfect symmetry.
sentences.cn: 他们要求的则是,在谈判中要取得完全的对等.

phrases.tran_cn: 辐射对称；径向对称；放射对称
